{{Wireless embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR5450 |revision= |upc=738168035212 |ean= |asin=B00009ETKW |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/11/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=O7J-GL2454MP-0T |ic_id=550A-15015 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Brecis |cpu1_model=MSP2006 |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=DE-9 |wi1_module=Global Sun GL2454MP-0T |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Radia |wi1_chip2_model=RC2422B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=USR5450 |default_ssid_regex=^USR5450$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:C0:49 |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|802.11g Wireless Turbo Multi-Function Access Point}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=5450}}
OEM: [[Global Sun]] Technology, appears to be similar to the USR8054. :The default SSID appears to be USR5450 (significant WiGLE :support [>1000] and in the manual).
*[http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Brecis_SOC Listed on the 'Brecis SOC' page on LinuxMIPS], :probably uses a MSP2006 like the USR8054
==Images== <gallery> File:USRobotics_USR5450_front.jpg|front File:USRobotics_USR5450_angled.jpg|angled File:USRobotics_USR5450_top.jpg|top File:USRobotics_USR5450_back.jpg|back File:USRobotics_USR5450_bottom.jpg|bottom </gallery>
